titles.title: Condemning the statements of Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan.
Condemning the statements of Representative Rashida Tlaib of Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) condemns certain statements made by Representative Rashida Tlaib, (2) condemns Members of Congress who advocate for anti-Semitic policies, and (3) reaffirms the commitment of the House of Representatives to support and defend the Constitution.
